Html:
Hello,

I have a currently a problem of printing zone (I think).

I open a .xls template that I fill with informations, then save.

Once I did that, when I open the new generated file, I have white zones all over the page,

and duplicated cells on random places.

If I save the file as pdf after, I get a lot of white pages, totally empty.

This problem happens with all the version of excel I tried.

I would like to specify that the template is defined with A4 format worksheet, there's 7 worksheets, with no border and the background is white.

 

Thanks for your help
